content.rendered:
In Framed, you have 6 chances to correctly guess the daily movie title. The game shows you a still image from the film and you have to name the movie.

Unlike Wordle, Framed doesn’t show how close your guesses are.

When you make your first guess, if it’s incorrect you will get 5 more chances.

As you use up your guesses, the still images become more recognizable. You may see well-known scenes or the main actor, even if the first image was unfamiliar.

Typing movie titles as you guess helps avoid spelling errors. Previous answers have included Howl’s Moving Castle, Knives Out, Catch Me If You Can and 12 Years a Slave.

framed unblocked features movies from all genres, from action blockbusters to art house dramas. Though not as well known as Wordle, Framed stands on its own as an enjoyable game in its own right.
